name: BLOX (itch)
description:
This is a 3D voxel sandbox game, highly inspired by Minecraft. It's still in development, so updates/bug fixes might come.

Controls

- Move -> WASD, Space 
- Run -> Shift 
- Crouch -> Ctrl 
- Select block -> 1,2,3....9 
- Select TNT -> X
- Explode TNT -> G 
- Pause -> Esc 
- Hide UI -> F1

System Requirements

CPU - Intel i5 or above
GPU - Intel HD Graphics or above
Memory - 8GB RAM
